amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, an additional $16,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Army, for the Point of Maintenance/Arsenal/Depot AIT Initiative.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2486 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2486 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12592) To provide, with an offset, an additional $16,000,000 for Operation and Maintenance, Army, for the Point of Maintenance/Arsenal/Depot AIT Initiative.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2486 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2486 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Ensign.
